introduction: At CASA, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our platform.

content.personal-information: Name, phone number, shipping address, payment details, and other contact information.

content.browsing-data: Your interactions on the platform, such as products viewed, pages visited, and time spent on the app or website.

content.device-information: IP address, browser type, device type, and operating system.

content.cookies-and-tracking-technologies: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze platform performance.

content.shopping-experience: To provide, personalize, and improve your shopping experience.

content.transactions-and-deliveries: To process transactions, send order confirmations, and handle deliveries.

content.recommendations: To offer product recommendations based on your behavior.

content.communications: To communicate promotional offers, updates, and news (only with your consent).

content.fraud-prevention: To prevent fraud and ensure platform security.

content.no-selling: We do not sell your personal data to third parties. However, we may share your information with:

content.service-providers: For payment processing, delivery, and marketing services.

content.legal-authorities: When required by law or to protect CASA’s rights and safety.

content.business-partners: If you engage with third-party brands or products showcased on CASA.

sections.title: Your Data Rights

content.access: Request a copy of the data we hold about you.

content.correction: Request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete information.

content.deletion: Request the deletion of your data, subject to legal obligations.

content.opt-out: Unsubscribe from marketing emails and opt out of data tracking.

sections.note: To exercise these rights, please reach out to us through the contact options available on our platform.

content.security-measures: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to secure your data. However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute data protection.

content.data-retention: We retain personal information as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.

content.traffic-analysis: Analyze website traffic and usage patterns.

content.personalized-recommendations: Show personalized recommendations and advertisements (if applicable).

content.cookie-management: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

content.external-sites: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices, so we encourage you to review their policies when visiting external sites.

content.age-restriction: CASA is not intended for children under the age of 13.

content.data-deletion: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we discover that we have received information from a child, we will delete it promptly.

content.policy-updates: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.

content.change-notifications: Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you if the changes are significant.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.note: For any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please use the contact options available on our platform.
